API Reference¶

Repositories¶

User Repository¶

class app.repositories.auth.UserRepository[source]¶

Bases: object

Repository for User entity operations using SQLAlchemy Session.

async confirm_email(email: str, db: sqlalchemy.orm.Session)[source]¶

Mark user’s email as confirmed. Raises 404 if user not found.

async create_user(body: UserRegisterSchema, db: sqlalchemy.orm.Session)[source]¶

Create a new user, ensuring unique email. Raises HTTP 400 on conflict.

async get_user_by_email(email: str, db: sqlalchemy.orm.Session)[source]¶

Return a user by email or None.

async get_user_refresh_token(email: str, refresh_token: str, db: sqlalchemy.orm.Session)[source]¶

Return a user by email with matching refresh token or None.

async update_avatar_url(email: str, avatar_url: str, db: sqlalchemy.orm.Session)[source]¶

Update user’s avatar URL and return updated user.

verify_password(plain_password: str, hashed_password: str)[source]¶
verify_refresh_token(refresh_token: str, db: sqlalchemy.orm.Session)[source]¶
async app.services.email.send_email(email: pydantic.EmailStr, username: str, host: str)[source]¶

Send a verification email containing a confirmation link.

Parameters:

  • email – Recipient address.

  • username – Recipient user name for personalization.

  • host – Base URL of the API used to build confirmation links.

class app.services.cache.CacheService[source]¶

Bases: object

Cache service for storing and retrieving current user by access token.

async get_user_by_token(token: str) → object | None[source]¶

Retrieve cached user by access token or None if missing/expired.

async set_user_for_token(token: str, user) → None[source]¶

Cache minimal user payload under the given access token.

static upload_file(file, username) → str[source]¶

Upload a file to Cloudinary and return a 200x200 fill-cropped URL.

User domain service wrappers around repository operations.

API Routers¶

async app.api.v1.auth.confirm_password_reset(token: str, new_password: str, db: sqlalchemy.orm.Session = fastapi.params.Depends)¶

Reset password using a valid reset token.

async app.api.v1.auth.confirmed_email(token: str, db: sqlalchemy.orm.Session = fastapi.params.Depends)¶

Confirm user email using a token from the verification email.

async app.api.v1.auth.get_new_refresh_token(request: TokenRefreshRequest, db: sqlalchemy.orm.Session = fastapi.params.Depends)¶

Create a new access token from a valid refresh token.

async app.api.v1.auth.request_password_reset(body: UserResponseSchema, db: sqlalchemy.orm.Session = fastapi.params.Depends)¶

Request a password reset and receive a reset token.

async app.api.v1.auth.signup(body: fastapi.security.OAuth2PasswordRequestForm = fastapi.params.Depends, db: sqlalchemy.orm.Session = fastapi.params.Depends)¶

Log in with email and password and receive access/refresh tokens.

async app.api.v1.users.update_user_avatar(file: fastapi.UploadFile = fastapi.params.File, user: UserResponseSchema = fastapi.params.Depends, db: sqlalchemy.orm.Session = fastapi.params.Depends)¶

Update user’s avatar; only admins are allowed to change avatar.
